name: Verra Mobility Corporation
description: Verra Mobility Corporation is a leading provider of smart mobility technologies and solutions that enhance the safety and efficiency of transportation systems. Founded in 2018, Verra Mobility focuses on the development and deployment of advanced technology and services for transportation management, including tolling, parking, and automated enforcement solutions. The company operates in the realm of intelligent transportation systems, utilizing innovative technologies to streamline the vehicle and mobility experience for cities, municipalities, and transportation agencies. Verra Mobility offers a range of products and services, such as vehicle registration and title services, automated tolling systems, and citation processing. With a commitment to improving road safety and reducing congestion, Verra Mobility is at the forefront of transforming how people and goods move in urban environments. The company aims to connect the physical and digital worlds of mobility to support the evolution of smart cities and enhance the overall travel experience.
